pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dumitru Cornilescu (4 April 1891 - 1975), a Romanian orthodox archdeacon, later a Protestant minister created this translation in 1921. It is popular particularly among protestants. Copyright of the Cornilescu Bible © 1924 belongs to British and Foreign Bible Society.
